messages.subject: Re: Conference registration deadline
messages.msgSnippet: The Sackman gang is coming to the conference!  Whoo-hoo!  And my parents too - go figure that!  I just wanted to let you all know because I am looking forward
messages.messageBody:
The Sackman gang is coming to the conference! Whoo-hoo! And my parents
too - go figure that! I just wanted to let you all know because I am
looking forward to meeting you and seeing your children firsthand.
Enough of this email stuff! Give it to me for real!
-Alice
Mom/Aunt to Logan 13, Rooster 8, Audrey 5 and poor hubby has to stay
home but will be with us in spirit

messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Conference registration deadline
messages.msgSnippet: Shannon, payment is here. I ve been trying myself  to get the registration to download. I couldn t. Asked my husband and teenager ---also no luck. Even my
messages.messageBody:
Shannon, payment is here. I've been trying myself to get the
registration to download. I couldn't. Asked my husband and teenager
<g>---also no luck. Even my web designer couldn't open it.

If you could maybe cut and paste the registration into an e-mail and
then fill it out then?

If nothing else, I can call you to get the information and fill it out
by hand! <g>

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith

-----Original Message-----
From: Shannon Towler <itsasled@...>

> Hi Kelly,
>
> I just wanted to confirm that you have our registration and payment
through
> pay pal. We haven¹t received any confirmation.
>
> Thanks,
> Shannon Towler
>
________________________________________________________________________

messages.subject: Conference registration deadline
messages.msgSnippet: Just a gentle reminder than the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference s Early Bird deadline is approaching. It s only two weeks away---the end of this month:
messages.messageBody:
Just a gentle reminder than the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference's
Early Bird deadline is approaching. It's only two weeks away---the end
of this month: June 30, 2006.

Funshop and scholarship requests are also due by the end of June.



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://liveandlearnconference.org

"The hardest problem for the brain is not learning, but forgetting. No
matter how hard we try, we can't deliberately forget something we have
learned, and that is catastrophic if we learn that we can't learn."
~Frank Smith
